statusHistory.notes: Childhood pirate crew formed fifty years before the main timeline
Crew separated when five members disappeared into Rainbow Mist

members.notes: Left behind when he sacrificed himself so friends could escape

keyMoments.title: Pumpkin Pirates Origin Story
keyMoments.description: Henzo reveals that fifty years ago, he and five friends formed the Pumpkin Pirates intending to become pirates together. When Wetton attacked their town, they fled on the Tarielishin ship.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew's history and the tragic circumstances that led to their separation.

keyMoments.title: Crew Separation in Rainbow Mist
keyMoments.description: During their escape, Henzo fell into the sea while five members sailed into the Rainbow Mist and disappeared, effectively disbanding the crew.
keyMoments.significance: The tragic event that separated the crew and drove Henzo's fifty-year quest to reunite with his friends.

goals: To become pirates and sail the seas together (never achieved)
disbandmentReason: Five members disappeared into the Rainbow Mist during escape from Wetton's attack, separating the crew permanently
